txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Coarse skins from the beasts found throughout the northern North Downs. Deliver the items to Birgir Listmaster at Othrikar.
'Completed: a simple task to obtain coarse skins from beasts. We are grateful.'
'Beast skins can be cured and made into good bags for carrying. We could use some more of those bags.'
Birgir Listmaker, one of the miners at Othrikar in the northern reaches of the North Downs, awaits the delivery of coarse skin.
Deliver the coarse skins to Birgir Listmaker at Othrikar
You are on a task to deliver coarse skins from the beasts in the North Downs to Birgir Listmaker at Othrikar. Othrikar is north of Esteld√≠n in the North Downs.
Wanted: Coarse skins from the beasts found throughout the northern North Downs.
